items.sentence: Tom\'s mother told him that he should ask Mary over for dinner.
Tom\'s office door was unlocked, but nothing was found missing.
Tom was three when his mother was killed in a traffic accident.
Tom asked Mary if she could help him with his science homework.
Tom wanted to be able to play the ukulele as well as Mary does.
Tom wants to know whether you plan to come to his party or not.
Tom was able to park a half a block away from the concert hall.
I found what I was looking for just where Tom said it would be.
This question can\'t be answered with an unqualified yes or no.
I didn\'t tell Tom why I didn\'t want to go to Boston with him.
Tom fell down two flights of stairs and is now in the hospital.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me I didn\'t need to do that.
Do you want me to call and see if I can get you an appointment?
Mary gets upset when Tom leaves his dirty clothes on the floor.
My boss told me that I needed to get better at speaking French.
Tom and Mary haven\'t yet told anyone they\'re getting married.
The last person that I told my idea to thought that I was nuts.
Tom has never told Mary the truth about what happened that day.
Tom stayed in the classroom after class to talk to the teacher.
It is necessary to secure financing for local road maintenance.
